overview: Yali Harari is the CEO of 3i-MIND since the companyâ€™s inception in October, 2009. Yali has extensive management background in the technology space. In her last position Yali served as Corporate VP, Global Services for NICE systems, a global leader in solutions for the security and enterprise markets. During her tenure at NICE Yali led the services organization to increased revenue, while improving customer satisfaction. Prior to that position, Yali was CEO of Kamoon Inc. a knowledge management profiling and collaboration technology provider. Her first role as CEO was at Tescom, a Q &A testing services company.
